chapter_goal: Investigate the phantom cruise ship's origins

characters.name: Lin Xiu
characters.personality: Skilled in psychological manipulation, always wears a glove on the left hand
characters.health_status: Heterochromia (left eye golden, right eye brown)

characters.name: Chen Xiaodao
characters.personality: Seems timid but actually has amazing powers of observation

relationships.new_detail: Chen Xiaodao witnesses Lin Xiu using his golden eye to manipulate ghostly crew members
Chen Xiaodao secretly replaces Su Mingyue's broken UV lamp with one from his collection

scenes.name: Crew Quarters
scenes.atmosphere: Claustrophobic with eerie shadows that seem to watch

scenes.name: Observation Deck
scenes.atmosphere: Open but with a feeling of being trapped under the stars

events.name: Uniform Discovery
events.details: While organizing crew uniforms, Chen Xiaodao finds name tags that include his own name from 20 years ago
consequences: Realizes he may have a connection to the original disappearance
Finds a hidden compartment with personal items resembling his own

events.name: Time-Loop Service
events.details: While serving drinks, Chen Xiaodao observes the same passengers having the exact same conversations hours apart
consequences: Keeps meticulous notes of repeating events
Develops ability to predict ghostly passengers' actions

events.name: Ghostly Protection
events.details: Chen Xiaodao's steward instincts kick in when he sees ghosts harassing Su Mingyue, intervening in ways that strangely affect spirits
consequences: Ghosts begin treating Chen Xiaodao with deference
Su Mingyue notices his extraordinary knowledge of the ship

events.name: Mirror Encounter
events.details: In the crew bathroom, Chen Xiaodao sees an older version of himself in the mirror mouthing warnings
consequences: Receives cryptic clues about the ship's navigation system
Develops a strange sunburn despite being indoors

events.name: Stowaway Revelation
events.details: While inventorying supplies, Chen Xiaodao discovers evidence that someone is still secretly living aboard the phantom ship
consequences: Finds food stolen from his own supplies
Identifies hiding places only a crew member would know
